short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension, you can copy password like **** to pasteboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By default, the password like **** on web page is not allowed to copy. 
Having this extension installed, you can copy password to your pasteboard just like copy normal text.
